sections.text:
73-906.Technology-related product or service; certain contracts prohibited.

No public entity shall enter into any contract or contract renewal that would result in any state or local government funds being transferred:

(1) To a scrutinized company in connection with any technology-related product or service; or

(2) To any company in connection with any technology-related product or service that originates with a scrutinized company.

SourceLaws 2024, LB1300, ยง 12;Laws 2025, LB644, ยง 29.Operative Date: October 1, 2025
